description:
gc: support for building with Plan 9 yacc

I've modified Plan 9's yacc to work with
the grammar in go.y.  These are the only
changes necessary on the Go side.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7a3dc6d535b7 ***

gc: support for building with Plan 9 yacc

I've modified Plan 9's yacc to work with
the grammar in go.y.  These are the only
changes necessary on the Go side.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 5375104: gc: support for building with Plan 9 yacc
